sourcesContent:
import { Box, Button, FormControl, FormErrorMessage, FormHelperText, FormLabel, Heading ,Input, Modal, ModalBody, ModalCloseButton, ModalContent, ModalFooter, ModalHeader, ModalOverlay, Text, useDisclosure} from '@chakra-ui/react'
import React, { useState } from 'react'
import { useContext } from 'react'
import { AppContex } from '../Context/AppContext'

export const Home = () => {
    
    const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure()
    const finalRef = React.useRef(null)
    const [state , setState] = useState({name:"", email:'', num:''})
    const Info =(e)=>
    {
        const { name , value} = e.target
        setState({...state , [name]:value})
      
    }
    const arr= JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("formData"))||[];

     const save =()=>
     {
        console.log(state)
        arr.push(state)
        localStorage.setItem("formData",JSON.stringify(arr))
        
     }
    return (
      <>
        <Box ref={finalRef} tabIndex={-1} aria-label='Focus moved to this box'>
          Some other content that'll receive focus on close.
        </Box>
  
        <Button mt={4} onClick={onOpen}>
          Open Modal
        </Button>
        <Modal finalFocusRef={finalRef} isOpen={isOpen} onClose={onClose}>
          <ModalOverlay />
          <ModalContent>
            <ModalHeader>Modal Title</ModalHeader>
            <ModalCloseButton />
            <ModalBody >
              {/* <Lorem count={2} /> */}
              <Input mb='2rem' type='text'  name="name"  placeholder='Enter Name' 
                                                         onChange={Info}
                                                         value={state.name} />

              <Input  mb='2rem' type='emeil' name="email"  placeholder='Enter email'  
                                                           onChange={Info} 
                                                           value={state.email}/>

              <Input   mb='2rem'  type='Number' name="num"   placeholder='Enter Mobile No' 
                                                             onChange={Info}
                                                             value={state.num}/>
              
            
            </ModalBody>
  
            <ModalFooter>
              <Button colorScheme='blue' mr={3} onClick={onClose}>
                Close
              </Button>
              <Button onClick={save} alert variant='ghost'>Submit</Button>
            </ModalFooter>
          </ModalContent>
        </Modal>
      </>
    )
  }
